name: Asale.in
overview:
Buy & sell used,old books on asale.in

Internet is fast spreading its wings on all aspects of e-commerce including buying and selling of used or second hand goods. Bookstores/booksellers in India are not far behind either and are going online to enable direct and personalized transaction between buyers and sellers.

Asale.in is the select online platform that facilitates buying and selling of old or used books in India. It aims to bring booksellers and buyers together. Our virtual showcase is complete with books on every subject. The exclusive feature of our vibrant website is that each of the books displayed in the catalog is furnished with full details about the book and contact details of the booksellers across India. This exercise has been undertaken keeping in mind the large country that India is, with its far-flung remote areas.

we encourage everyone in India to sell and purchase old or used books by joining hands with us. The process is very easy for both booksellers and purchasers. All a bookseller has to do is to create a personal account, and list old or used books with us for sale. Book buyers can have a quick twitter on a spectrum of books at the click of the mouse. To purchase books, they can contact sellers through personal messages sent to sellers account, email or phone.
